content.en: Cerebral Oximetry Advances: Researchers are investigating the use of algorithms in various medical scenarios to measure and monitor cerebral saturation, cerebral desaturation, cerebral perfusion, and regional cerebral oxygenation. These algorithms are being used to calibrate and validate near-infrared cerebral oximeters, interpret cerebral oximetry measurements, optimize cerebral oxygenation, quantify regional cerebral oxygenation, and guide hemodynamic management. The goal is to improve clinical outcomes and provide targeted interventions for organ perfusion, brain oxygenation, and the prediction of cardiac arrest.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for Cerebral Oximetri: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer i forskellige medicinske scenarier for at måle og overvåge cerebral saturation, cerebral desaturation, cerebral perfusion og regional cerebral iltning. Disse algoritmer bruges til at kalibrere og validere nær-infrarøde cerebrale oximetre, tolke cerebrale oximetrimålinger, optimere cerebral iltning, kvantificere regional cerebral iltning og styre hæmodynamisk behandling. Målet er at forbedre kliniske resultater og levere målrettede interventioner for organperfusion, hjerneiltning og forudsigelse af hjertestop.
